column4: Hey.. I got some questions about installing Ubuntu server.. If I install Ubuntu Server, it connects to the internet automatically? Because Server doesnt have X environmnent, what should I do if it doesnt connect to internet, to install pakages?
Is it a headless server? If not then you will still have a terminal interface with the keyboard and screen.
Sorry, I speak spanish.. What do u mean 'headless server'? and.. Yes, I have the terminal, but it connects automatically to the eth0?
